content: Has major progress been made on -Z build-std in the past year? That was when I was last looking at the feature. A cursory search for information was fruitless. Given the niche use case, asking seemed like the best course of action. My goal to use std on a closed proprietary AArch64 target.

There is progress, but it is slow (FWIW, I opened a significant PR a few days ago https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/74033). I would not rely on it for anything serious. You can follow the tracking issue at https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-cargo-std-aware/issues/9 for major milestones.
I'm curious if there's any plan to migrate rustbuild/bootstrap to use build-std....
@Charles Lew No plan, and it is very low priority. More details in https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-cargo-std-aware/issues/51
